title: Can't log in
body: When I try to log in since the new patch I either get a 'Unexpected error occured' message or just left stuck in 'Authenticating' eternally.

replies.body: It seems like your connection is getting blocked from reaching the authentication server, so you're likely to time out.  You'll want to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot towards a fix.  Hit me up if you have any questions, though!
